title: So far from India
creator_credit: Mira Nair Productions and Mira Nair
brief_description: A documentary of the complex rhythm of middle class family life in a town in India. Tension occurs when the man, who has immigrated to New York fails to send for his family. He returns home to find many problems facing him.
